00040 void RequestHandlerReaddir::run() {
00041   ResponseCallbackReaddir cb(m_comm, m_event_ptr);
00042   size_t remaining = m_event_ptr->message_len - 2;
00043   const uint8_t *msg = m_event_ptr->message + 2;
00044 
00045   try {
00046     uint64_t handle = decode_i64(&msg, &remaining);
00047 
00048     m_master->readdir(&cb, m_session_id, handle);
00049   }
00050   catch (Exception &e) {
00051     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00052     cb.error(e.code(), "Error handling READDIR message");
00053   }
00054 }
